programme.title: Waking Up to Christmas
programme.desc: On the verge of a massive deadline, a cynical workaholic must turn Christmas around in her small town after a small mishap.

programme.title: A European Christmas
programme.desc: When Christmas movie director Ivy has another 'heartless' flop, she seeks the star of her debut hit in snowy Serbia. Despite refusing to return, he shows her the wonder of Serbian Christmas.

programme.title: Christmas in Scotland
programme.desc: On vacation in Scotland, a New York installation designer is tasked with helping a small, rural community compete in a "Best Christmas Village" festival. She is forced to work with a wealthy, heir who sees Christmas as an inconvenience.

programme.title: A Very English Christmas
programme.desc: Christmas in the English countryside isn't in Emma's plans until her sister, Amy, plans her wedding for Christmas eve. Dylan, Amy's Christmas market co-owner, teams up with Emma to bring order to the whirlwind wedding.

programme.title: Being Erica
programme.desc: After three years of therapy, Erica finds herself right back where she started.

programme.title: Being Erica
programme.desc: Erica learns the true meaning of the holidays.

programme.title: Being Erica
programme.desc: Erica begins the final stage of her therapy as a doctor in training and is shocked to know her first patient.

programme.title: Love in Bloom
programme.desc: Sparks fly between a Chicago florist and a best man as they try to save a stranded couple's wedding in Australia.

programme.title: The Love Gala
programme.desc: When Kate is given the job of planning her mom's Garden Gala, the biggest fashion event of the year, she has to compromise with the unhelpful head of the Botanical Garden.

programme.title: The Wedding Contest
programme.desc: When a couple can't decide on a wedding theme, they hire two wedding planners, Taylor and Ben, to compete for the job by proposing two very different styles.

programme.title: Two Chefs and a Wedding Cake
programme.desc: At her sister's wedding, a food critic meets a chef known for excluding food reviewers entry to his restaurant and must find a way to reconcile their differences.

programme.title: A Sprinkle of Christmas
programme.desc: Libby, a baker, has opened up her business just in time for the Christmas season. She finds herself in a heated online feud with Peter after he gives the bakery a scathing review.

programme.title: A Christmas Vintage
programme.desc: Samantha goes home to help her love struck sister, Emily, during the holidays. She discovers that Emily and Tony can not be together unless Samantha attracts and dates the unpleasant Parker Williams, an owner of a competing winery.

programme.title: 12 Dares of Christmas
programme.desc: A teacher's quiet holiday season gets a jolt of spice when she accepts a 12 dares of Christmas challenge from her sister.

programme.title: A Merry Royal Christmas
programme.desc: A wedding planner pulled in for a last-minute royal wedding on Christmas Day is shocked to discover the groom is the alluring stranger she met before.

programme.title: A Cape Cod Christmas
programme.desc: When a children's author hosts one last Christmas dinner with her disagreeable siblings before they sell the family house, she reunites with her childhood sweetheart who helps her find a way to keep the home she loves so dearly.
